Package com.feedback.backend

Class DataBaseFunctions

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
com.feedback.backend.DataBaseFunctions
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
public class DataBaseFunctions
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteInterface
This class handle the Database connection and facilitate to the implementation of the RemoteInterface for CRUD operations. This class bind into a registry as a remote object.

Find the repository - https://github.com/SanushRadalage/StudentFeedbackSystem
Author:
Maleeka Sanush Radalage
See Also:
Serialized Form

      public void sendEmailWithAttachments​(java.lang.String toAddress) throws javax.mail.internet.AddressException, javax.mail.MessagingException
      Implementation of remote interface method. This method create a new session with mail authenticator.
